title: Hello Fred!
description: Hello Fred! Hello sun! Hello friend! Run! Run! Run! Hello Fred is the perfect anytime book. It's written in rhyme and has lots of colorful pictures that children are sure to love. Perfect for young children, beginning readers looking to practice their reading skills and anyone who loves a good book. Also, as a bonus, I have included at the end of this book some laugh-out-loud jokes that are sure to make you laugh!
author: N.V. Smith
